After the authorization is revoked, the device will unbind with your current login account and clear the data stored in the server before the device is deleted.The data stored in the physical device needs to be cleared after the manual local physical reset. If the device is supported, you can reset it directly on the device or reset it according to the revocation authorization in the privacy policy.None of the above data can be recovered after revocation.To reuse the device, you need to bind again and reauthorize.
